item.title: Libby add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Sometimes people are beautiful. Not in looks. Not in what they say. Just in what they are." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Libby add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "Got to be the worst place in the world, inside a oven. You in here, you either cleaning or you getting cooked." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Libby add a quote by Kristin Billerbeck
item.description: "Sometimes our biggest mistakes give us our greatest reward." -- Kristin Billerbeck

item.title: Libby add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "That which we persist in doing becomes easier to do, not that the nature of the thing has changed but that our power to do has increased." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Libby add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "This is a good sign, having a broken heart. It means we have tried for something." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Libby add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Having a baby is like getting a tattoo on your face. You really need to be certain it's what you want before you commit." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Libby add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "The only thing worse than a boy who hates you: a boy that loves you." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Libby add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Maybe everyone can live beyond what they're capable of." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Libby add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Sometimes you read a book so special that you want to carry it around with you for months after you've finished just to stay near it." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Libby add a quote by Betty Smith
item.description: "I know that's what people say-- you'll get over it. I'd say it, too. But I know it's not true. Oh, youll be happy again, never fear. But you won't forget. Every time you fall in love it will be because something in the man reminds you of him." -- Betty Smith

item.title: Libby add a quote by Betty Smith
item.description: "I hate all those flirty-birty games that women make up. Life's too short. If you ever find a man you love, don't waste time hanging your head and simpering. Go right up to him and say, 'I love you. How about getting married?" -- Betty Smith

item.title: Libby add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Both Rowling and Meyer, they’re speaking directly to young people. … The real difference is that Jo Rowling is a terrific writer and Stephenie Meyer can’t write worth a darn. She’s not very good." -- Stephen King

item.title: Libby add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all - in which case, you fail by default." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Libby add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Libby add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Libby add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Libby add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Libby add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Dreams are always crushing when they don't come true. But it's the simple dreams that are often the most painful because they seem so personal, so reasonable, so attainable. You're always close enough to touch, but never quite close enough to hold and it's enough to break your heart." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Libby add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Life, I've learned, is never fair. If they teach anything in schools, that should be it." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Libby add a quote by Jon Krakauer
item.description: "HAPPINESS [is] ONLY REAL WHEN SHARED" -- Jon Krakauer

item.title: Libby add a quote by Jon Krakauer
item.description: "Some people feel like they don't deserve love. They walk away quietly into empty spaces, trying to close the gaps of the past." -- Jon Krakauer

item.title: Libby add a quote by Jon Krakauer
item.description: "The core of mans' spirit comes from new experiences." -- Jon Krakauer

item.title: Libby add a quote by Jon Krakauer
item.description: "So many people live within unhappy circumstances and yet will not take the initiative to change their situation because they are conditioned to a life of security, conformity, and conservatism, all of which may appear to give one peace of mind, but in reality nothing is more dangerous to the adventurous spirit within a man than a secure future. The very basic core of a man’s living spirit is his passion for adventure. The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun." -- Jon Krakauer

item.title: Libby add a quote by Sue Bender
item.description: "Listening to your heart is not simple. Finding out who you are is not simple. It takes a lot of hard work and courage to get to know who you are and what you want." -- Sue Bender

item.title: Libby add a quote by Sue Bender
item.description: "Miracles come after a lot of hard work." -- Sue Bender

item.title: Libby add a quote by Sue Bender
item.description: "Satisfaction comes from giving up wishing I was somewhere else or doing something else." -- Sue Bender

item.title: Libby add a quote by Jay Asher
item.description: "No one knows for certain how much impact they have on the lives of other people. Oftentimes, we have no clue. Yet we push it just the same." -- Jay Asher

item.title: Libby add a quote by Jay Asher
item.description: "Sometimes we have thoughts that even we don't understand. Thoughts that aren't even true—that aren't really how we feel—but they're running through our heads anyway because they're interesting to think about." -- Jay Asher

item.title: Libby add a quote by Jay Asher
item.description: "In the end....everything matters." -- Jay Asher

item.title: Libby add a quote by Jay Asher
item.description: "You can't go back to how things were. How you thought they were. All you really have is...now." -- Jay Asher
